channel.title: Swift on Develop with Dillon
channel.description: Recent content in Swift on Develop with Dillon

item.title: Writing Short Code Isn't The Point
item.description: I don’t know about you, but I have spent a lot of time trying to write code in the shortest, most elegant way possible. I have put a lot of thought and time and effort into it over the years. And I see it a lot in other people’s code as well. I have seen it from both junior and senior developers. I have seen it in new code bases and mature code bases, both large and small.

item.title: Algorithms in Swift - Intro
item.description: In this post, I want to talk about algorithms in general, take a look at the binary search algorithm, and examine how to think about the complexity of an algorithm.
